original_text: So Abram went up from Egypt, he and his wife and all that he had, and Lot with him, into the Negeb.
korean_text: 아브람이 애굽에서 그와 그의 아내와 모든 소유와 롯과 함께 네게브로 올라가니

sentences.original_text: So Abram went up from Egypt,
he and his wife and all that he had,
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 아내와 그가 가진 모든 것과,
